maintainers.name: Sascha Mann
maintainers.bio: Physics student. Learned about Julia in a class and decided to dig more into it. Very promising language and I wanted to get involved in its community.

maintainers.name: Logan Kilpatrick
maintainers.bio: I began using Julia when I was getting started as a Software Engineering Intern at NASA. Since then, I have gone on to Intern with Julia Computing on the PumasAI project, win a new Julia Language contributor award for 2019, and authored a few small packages. The Julia programming language and community are incredible. I am looking forward to helping more in the future.

maintainers.name: Colin Caine
maintainers.bio: I write code for scientific papers (computer science and social science) and commercial projects in Julia. It's my favourite language and I'm happy to help a few more people learn it!
